items.sentence: I was watching television when the telephone rang.
A fallen leaf floated on the surface of the water.
A gang of three robbed the bank in broad daylight.
Tom looks like someone who\'s used to being alone.
How long have you and Tom been going out together?
How long would it take to get to Boston from here?
How many gallons do you think this tank will hold?
How many people do you know that can speak French?
How many times have I told you not to talk to Tom?
Were you the one who made the coffee this morning?
Were you the one who told Tom about what happened?
What are the chances of this ever happening again?
It would take a long time to tell the whole story.
Tom didn\'t know how to say "thank you" in French.
Tom didn\'t know that Mary was going to Australia.
Tom didn\'t know where Mary had put her suitcases.
Tom didn\'t know where Mary usually went shopping.
Tom was my younger brother\'s roommate in college.
Some people were sunbathing, others were swimming.
I had never seen a giraffe till I visited the zoo.
